Google Glass for Web Developers

Introduction to basics of Google Glass development using Google Mirror API

There are two ways to develop Google Glass application. Advanced method is using standard GDK (Android) development for building native applications that run on Glass. However, Google has made it possible for web developers with no Java/Android knowledge to build simple applications and interact with Google Glass using REST services and their knowledge of web development. This demo is targeting web developers with basic knowledge of REST

Demir Selmanovic

Developer and project manager with over 15 years of professional experience in a wide range of software development roles. Excels as a solo developer, team member, team leader, or manager of multiple distributed teams. Working closely with clients to define ideas and deliver products. Latest personal preference is NodeJS and Android development but looking at history it is likely to change again in the next few years.
